column5: michigan mr. green passed away saturday
column7: 2015 at his residence. age 61 years. the son of the late james acel and kathleen (rundell) green was born march 22
column9: michigan. james attended saginaw high school
column10: retired as an electrician and served in the u. s. navy on the uss forrestal (cv-59). mr. green is survived by his wife the former shelly marie willett whom he married march 27
column14: jimmy green iv and his fianc
column16: jenny (bill) fiebig and tina (jeff) wojtowicz; five grandchildren
column22: william bill green; brothers-in-law and sisters-in-law
column25: dan willett and darrell willett. in addition to his parents mr. green was also preceded in death by one sister
column28: harvey danial and arlene dorothy (stewart) willett. funeral and committal services will take place at 11:00 a. m. on friday
column31: inc. officiating will be rev. charles campbell with private interment in great lakes national cemetery. friends may call at the gephart funeral home
column32: inc. on friday from 10:00 a. m. and until the time of services. in lieu of flowers those planning an expression of sympathy may wish to consider memorial contributions to the wishes of the family. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 gephart funeral home funeral home website by batesville
